channel.title: Comments on: Logitech Harmony 880 Surgery
channel.description: One for the money, two for the show...

item.title: By: Johnny Angell
item.dc:creator: Johnny Angell
item.description: Justin, you posted your fix for the logitech 880 volume buttons back in 2008. How is the fix holding up? My 880 is giving me the same problem.
item.content:encoded: Justin, you posted your fix for the logitech 880 volume buttons back in 2008. How is the fix holding up? My 880 is giving me the same problem.
